title: Toreado Burritos
instructions: Step 1: Place the tortilla, previously reheated on the griddle.
Step 2: Add a portion of the following: Carne asada, guacamole, grated cheese, ranchera sauce and Cappy Toreado.
Step 3: Make the burrito, folding the tortilla from the side close to our body.
Step 4: Then fold the sides and finally roll up.
